content: Then it hit me. Fuck it. I’m a sales leader, not an entrepreneur. I LOVE sales. I had spent five years helping grow a business from 1–50m a year in net new sales. I wanted more. So I pushed my chips in, all of them. Inspired by the Daily V and seeing how hard you went I scheduled a blitz trip to Austin. 36 hours, 5 meetings, 2 dinners, one happy hour, $150 bucks in Uber fairs. 3 job offers.
